original: Ehnebom, Pär Birger, redaktör, civilekonom, Göteborg, f. 25/5/02 i Strömstad av köpm. Alfred E. o. Alma Torén. — Stud. v. Gbgs h. real, ^HG 25. Res. t. Engl. 25, Tyskl., Frankr. o. Belg. 29, Span., Marocko o. Portugal 34. Medarb. i Elanderska officinens publ. Tidsfördrif, En Rolig ^ Timma m. fl. Förf. av spec. kriminalrom. o. krim. short stories. Skr. bl. a.: J. Bartons största affär (26), Bremer, spritsmugglarkungen (28), Dödsstrålarne (32).
translated: Ehnebom, Pär Birger, editor, economist, Gothenburg, b. 25/5/02 in Strömstad to merchant Alfred E. and Alma Torén. - Stud. at Gothenburg high school, graduated in 1925. Traveled to England in 1925, Germany, France and Belgium in 1929, Spain, Morocco and Portugal in 1934. Collaborated with Elanderska officinens publ. Tidsfördrif, En Rolig Timma, among others. Author of crime novels and short stories. Wrote, among others: J. Barton's biggest deal (26), Bremer, the liquor smuggler king (28), Death rays (32).

hasOccupation.description: Collaborated with Elanderska officinens publ. Tidsfördrif, En Rolig Timma, among others.
Author of crime novels and short stories.
